page.title: 15LEISURE ACTIVITIES IN UPWEY
page.content: ON THURSDAY 4TH JULY 1985 WE VISITED UPWEY TO CONDUCT A SURVEY OF LEISURE ACTIVITIES.HERE ARE OUR NOTES OF ACTIVITIES IN OUR BLOCK: IN THE MEMORIAL HALL ACTIVITIES INCLUDE:UPWEY AND BROADWEY YOUTH CLUB,MAJORETTES,SATURDAY MARKET AND HARD OF HEARING CLUB. IN THE SHIP INN ACTIVITIES INCLUDE: MORNING COFFEE AND SKITTLES. IN UPWEY HALL NEAR THE WISHING WELL ACTIVITIES INCLUDE:SCOUTS,POTTERY, SPINNING AND ART SHOWS.IT IS INTERESTING TO NOTE THE HALL IS OWNED BY THE VILLAGE OF UPWEY AND MANY ACTIVITIES TAKE PLACE THERE . IN THE MASONS ARMS ACTIVITIES INCLUDE :SKITTLES. TWO POPULAR REQUIREMENTS WERE A TENNIS COURT AND MORE GENERAL AMENITIES FOR OLD AGED PENSIONERS.
